arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	-- Take control of follower, turn off AI, run to location
	-- Replace Follower with static Nizaar
	-- Nizaar yells out for Borza to show himself
	
	followerNizaar = idActor
	idTrigger = idActorDetector
	idStartConvoTrigger = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idTrigger, "StartConvoTrigger")[1]
	tPlayers = Hydra.PlayerActors()
	
	-- find the player the follower is attached to
	for i, idQuestPlayer in ipairs(tPlayers) do
		if Hydra.PlayerGetFollowers(idQuestPlayer) == 1 then
			idPlayer = idQuestPlayer
		end
	end
	
	Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(followerNizaar)
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(followerNizaar, false)
	Hydra.QActorSheath(followerNizaar)
	Hydra.QActorPlaySimpleConversation(convNizaarCallout, followerNizaar)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(followerNizaar, idActorDetector, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(followerNizaar, idActorDetector)
	Hydra.WaitForQEmpty(followerNizaar)
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convNizaarCallout)
	Hydra.EventSend("NizaarStopped", idActorDetector)

end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)

	Hydra.ActorDelete(followerNizaar)
	idStaticNizaar = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_NizaarCombat", idTrigger, false, 0, 0)
	
	-- Equip static Nizaar
	if Hydra.IsGameVariableStringEqual("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPickedDungeon", "Bow") then
	
		Hydra.QActorSetLoadout(idStaticNizaar, id2HBow)
		Hydra.ActorAIOverrideNormalBehavior(idStaticNizaar, "Generic_Event_NPC_Combat_Ranged")
		--Hydra.TraceScreen("@@@@@ BOW")
		
	elseif Hydra.IsGameVariableStringEqual("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPickedDungeon", "Greatsword") then
	
		Hydra.QActorSetLoadout(idStaticNizaar, id2HSword)
		--Hydra.TraceScreen("@@@@@ GREATSWORD")
	
	elseif Hydra.IsGameVariableStringEqual("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPickedDungeon", "Mace") then
	
		Hydra.QActorSetLoadout(idStaticNizaar, id1HMace)
		--Hydra.TraceScreen("@@@@@ MACE")
		
	elseif Hydra.IsGameVariableStringEqual("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPickedDungeon", "Sword") then
	
		Hydra.QActorSetLoadout(idStaticNizaar, id1HSword, id1HShield)
		--Hydra.TraceScreen("@@@@@ SWORD SHIELD")

	else
	
		Hydra.QActorSetLoadout(idStaticNizaar, id1HSword, id1HShield)
		--Hydra.TraceScreen("@@@@@ NOTHING! FALLING BACK TO SWORD SHIELD")
		
	end
	
	Hydra.ActorEnable(idStartConvoTrigger)
	
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	idPlayer = idActor
	
	-- Spawn Boss, make him invuln & untargetable for dialog scene
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convNizaarCallout)
	Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdateLinkedToActor(idActorDetector, "Boss")
	idBoss = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_BanditBoss")[1]
	idHalseyLoc = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActorInGroup(idActorDetector, "HalseyLoc")[1]
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idBoss, false)
	Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idBoss, true)
	Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idBoss, false)
	Hydra.Wait(1)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idBoss, idHalseyLoc, "NPC_Walk", true)
	
	-- Start scene between Nizaar and Borza
	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convHalseyConfront,idPlayer, idBoss, idStaticNizaar)
	Hydra.Wait(2)
	Hydra.ActorTriggerSpawnerUpdateLinkedToActor(idActorDetector, "Gang")
	tBanditSpawners = Hydra.ActorsInGroup("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_BanditBossCrew")
	
	for i, idBanditCrew in ipairs(tBanditSpawners) do
	
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idBanditCrew, false)
		Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idBanditCrew, true)
		Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idBanditCrew, false)
	
	end
	
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convHalseyConfront)
	Hydra.EventSend("BetrayalRevealed")
	
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, sWorldName)

	idPlayer = idActorPlayer
	followerNizaar = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_NizaarFollower_Armed")
	
	-- Only fire if the dungeon was previously empty. Don't keep
	-- swapping Nizaar's weapon if another party member joins late
	if #Hydra.PlayerActors() == 1 then
	
		if Hydra.IsPlayerVariableStringEqual(idPlayer, "QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPicked", "Bow") then
		
			Hydra.QActorSetLoadout(followerNizaar, id2HBow)
			Hydra.ActorAIOverrideNormalBehavior(followerNizaar, "NPC_Follower_Ranged")
			Hydra.SetGameVariableString("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPickedDungeon", "Bow")
			
		elseif Hydra.IsPlayerVariableStringEqual(idPlayer, "QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPicked", "Mace") then
		
			Hydra.QActorSetLoadout(followerNizaar, id1HMace)
			Hydra.SetGameVariableString("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPickedDungeon", "Mace")
			
		elseif Hydra.IsPlayerVariableStringEqual(idPlayer, "QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPicked", "Greatsword") then
		
			Hydra.QActorSetLoadout(followerNizaar, id2HSword)
			Hydra.SetGameVariableString("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPickedDungeon", "Greatsword")
		
		elseif Hydra.IsPlayerVariableStringEqual(idPlayer, "QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPicked", "Sword") then
		
			Hydra.QActorSetLoadout(followerNizaar, id1HSword, id1HShield)
			Hydra.SetGameVariableString("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPickedDungeon", "Sword")
	
		else
		
			Hydra.QActorSetLoadout(followerNizaar, id1HSword, id1HShield)
			Hydra.SetGameVariableString("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPickedDungeon", "Sword")
			
		end
	end
end

function Start()

	-- Turn all the Naughty Boys hostile and set them as killable
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convHalseyConfront)
	
	for i, idBanditCrew in ipairs(tBanditSpawners) do
	
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idBanditCrew, true)
		Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idBanditCrew, false)
		Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idBanditCrew, true)
	
	end
	
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idBoss, true)
	Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idBoss, false)
	Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idBoss, true)
	
	Hydra.ActorSetTeam(idStaticNizaar, Hydra.TEAM_MONSTER_DEFAULT)
	Hydra.ActorSetDamageCap(idStaticNizaar, 0.01)
	Hydra.ActorSetUseAlternateName(idStaticNizaar, true)
	
	Hydra.Wait(2)
	
	if Hydra.QuestCallbackCountGet(37) == 0 then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convNizaarLaugh, idStaticNizaar)
	end

end

arCallbackSets.unk_98d4504:
Hydra.Wait(2)
if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idPlayer) then

	Hydra.ActorPlayConversation(convPlayerEnd, idPlayer)

end

Hydra.QuestAdvancePhase()

arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActor, flPrevHP, flHp)

	Hydra.ActorSetTargetable(idActor, false)
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idActor, false)
	Hydra.ActorSetAnimSetOverride(idActor, animsetDie, true)
	Hydra.ActorSetIdleAnim(idActor, "AnimKey_Wounded_Crawl_Death")
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(convNizaarDie, idActor)
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(convNizaarDie)
	Hydra.ActorSetIdleAnim(idActor, "AnimKey_Dead")
	Hydra.ActorKill(idActor)

end
